attributes.action: Remove the VAT on diesel and petrol.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: VAT was added to demarcate LUXURY goods, not neccessites. Fuel is not a luxury for many families. Since the VAT was added in 1974, this tax, coupled with swingeing Fuel Duty has forced the price of fuel higher and higher, to now unreasonable levels. Simply put, as fuel (either petrol or diesel) is NOT a luxury item, VAT is an unfair tax on an already expensive item.
